text: Tomaž Petrovič (born 17 April 1979) is a Slovenian football manager. He was a manager of Celje between 12 June 2017 and 29 August 2017. He was previously a manager of Krško between 1 January 2014 and 13 March 2017. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1979 births Category:People from Brežice Category:Slovenian football managers Category:NK Interblock managers Category:NK Celje managers
title: Tomaž Petrovič
